cab.content: ^ This Docum-fciU n% Hte Britannic Majesty'!?10 160SECRET.OPERATIONS.From;- General Delme Radcliffe, Italy.C.I.G.SLondon.Handed in 2,45 a.m. 7-11.17,Received 7.30 a.m. 7,11,17.595 November 6th.I "have little to add concerning-disposition of 3rd and 2nd Armies,, Aircraft reconnaissances report enemy is establishing bridge boat at Madrisio and near Latisana. Rearguard of the Grenadiers Brigade was attacked near San VIto Sul Tagliamento but repelled the enemy.No more news cf retirement of 63rd and 36th divisions, Still no direct indication of enemy1s offensive intentions in Trentino.
